item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2015/04/03/underestimating-perl/#comment-4324">Ozh</a>.
Perl and poetry do have something of a history together.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Ozh.

Perl and poetry do have something of a history together.

item.title: By: Ozh
item.dc:creator: Ozh
item.description: Perl is really what got me into coding. The first time I saw a line like <code>$_ =~ /^wtf.*$/</code> I drooled and wanted to understand that typographic poetry :)
item.content:encoded: Perl is really what got me into coding. The first time I saw a line like $_ =~ /^wtf.*$/ I drooled and wanted to understand that typographic poetry ðŸ™‚
